name: Nancy Drew®: Danger by Design
description: Go Undercover in Paris and Unravel a Case in Style!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista Processor: 1GHz CPU Memory: 128MB RAM Graphics: 32MB DirectX video card DirectX®: 9.0 or higher Hard Drive: 650MB of free space Sound: 16bit DirectX sound card

reviews.review_text: Previously posted that this game doesn't work...It DOES in fact work, but none of the current articles provided for it anywhere were a solution, I had to get a friend to edit the Game.ini file and play with it til we found a solution.
Doesnt work on new computers. I have Windows 7 and it just wont run I can only hear music.
